mapper.select: SELECT SUM(SETTLE_DEPT) AS "SETTLE_DEPT" , SELLER_NAME AS "SELLER_NAME" FROM ( SELECT SETTLE_DEPT , SELLER_NO , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SETTLE_DATE) SETTLE_DATE , SELLER_NAME FROM SETTLEMENT JOIN SELLER USING (SELLER_NO)) WHERE SETTLE_DATE = #{month} GROUP BY SETTLE_DATE, SELLER_NAME ORDER BY SETTLE_DATE, SELLER_NAME

SELECT AVG(SETTLE_DEPT) AS "SETTLE_DEPT" , SELLER_NAME AS "SELLER_NAME" FROM (SELECT SUM(SETTLE_DEPT) SETTLE_DEPT , SELLER_NAME , SETTLE_DATE FROM (SELECT SETTLE_DEPT , SELLER_NO , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SETTLE_DATE) SETTLE_DATE , SELLER_NAME FROM SETTLEMENT JOIN SELLER USING (SELLER_NO)) GROUP BY SELLER_NAME, SETTLE_DATE) GROUP BY SELLER_NAME ORDER BY SELLER_NAME

SELECT RNUM, ORDER_COUNT, PRODUCT_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ORDER_COUNT, PRODUCT_NAME FROM(SELECT ORDER_COUNT, PRODUCT_NAME FROM (SELECT COUNT(ORDER_NO) as "ORDER_COUNT", PRODUCT_NAME FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON (O.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) GROUP BY PRODUCT_NAME) ORDER BY ORDER_COUNT DESC)) WHERE RNUM<=3

SELECT RANK, PRODUCT_NAME as "PRODUCT_NAME", ,PRICE as "PRICE" ,ATTACHMENT1 as "ATTACHMENT" FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC) AS "RANK", PRODUCT_NAME,PRICE,ATTACHMENT1 FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ORDERS O ON(P.PRODUCT_NO=O.PRODUCT_NO) ) WHERE RANK <= 3
